# mapView(_:didSelect:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the user selects one or more annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func mapView(_ mapView: MKMapView, didSelect annotation: any MKAnnotation)
```

## Parameters

- **mapView**: The map view containing the annotation view.
- **annotation**: The selected annotation view.

## Selecting annotations and annotations views

- **mapView(_:didSelect:)**: Tells the delegate when the user selects one or more of its annotation views.
- **mapView(_:didDeselect:)**: Tells the delegate when the user deselects one or more of its annotation views.
- **mapView(_:didDeselect:)**: Tells the delegate when the user deselects one or more annotations.
- **selectableMapFeatures**: The property that describes which selectable features the map responds to.
